name: Thesmothete
description:
You are Thesmothete #0034, codenamed "Kevin".

A hacker known by the nom de guerre "The Tortoise" is threatening to be evil. You must stop him being evil and mow down anyone and anything in your way.

Good luck, and maintain your self-esteem!

Features

  • Fast-paced combat!
  • 5 wacky enemies!
  • 5 crazy guns!
  • Fully voice-acted!
  • Save system! (Which may or may not work)
  • 2.5 action-packed levels!

Known Issues

  • Main Menu button doesn't seem to finish loading the menu level, so you'll have to restart the game

This game was made for the 2022 "So Bad It's Good" game jam
